original_text: As King David and all his people were leaving, they stopped at the last house on the edge of Jerusalem.
korean_text: 왕이 나가매 모든 백성이 다 따라서 벧메르학에 이르러 멈추어 서니

sentences.original_text: As King David and all his people were leaving
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗 왕과 그의 모든 백성이 떠날 때에

sentences.original_text: they stopped at the last house
